pageContent: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX X X brahmayaamalatantra X X X the manuscripts are all from the national archives kathmandu. the reel X numbers are those of the microfilm of the nepal geram manuscript preservation X project X X note that ms kh is the original palmleaf manuscript from which most, if not all X the other nepalese mss are ultimately derived. X X this is just a collation not an edition. X X the reader will need to make his own assessment of the how the words should be X divided. so too with many minor corrections. this text and others like it such as X the jayadrathayaamala, which are or will soon be on the muktabodha site require X collation with all available mss, location in other texts of parallel passages, and a X detailed understanding of the text to prepare the required thoroughly critical X editions. one hopes that this and other such collations and e-texts made from mss X will be helpful to scholars for preliminary reading and researchan ultimately to X assist in the process of making critical editions on the basis of which detailed X accurate study is possible. X X X k: 1-143, 833; ms. no.: p- 23 - 434; reel no: a 166/1; size: 32 1/2*16 1/1; X devanagari manuscripts.
